ygData.subject: Re: Diana
ygData.msgSnippet: Rion crouched in the sand, finally getting a good look at who had grabbed him. It was a bot, not a monster! The sun continued to beat down on him as he stood,

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Rion crouched in the sand, finally getting a good look at who had grabbed 
him. It was a 'bot, not a monster! The sun continued to beat down on him as 
he stood, his black feathers soaking up each and every ray. His own beast 
mode seemed to amplify the heat ten fold, and his unpadded feet were 
beginning to burn:

"M-Maximize!"

The hot wind singed his feathers as Rion transformed. He stood barely four 
feet at best, and he was tall for his age! After some careful positioning 
and near falls, Rion was able to stand and balance his massive wings. They 
were definitely going to be a problem, but he could worry about that later:

"I'm looking for a friend, have you seen her?"

Rion was trying to think of somthing else he could tell them about Diana. 
Her beast mode was probably different, and she wasn't anywhere within 
earshot as far as he knew. Slag! Why did they have to get seperated?! Now he 
was lost, in a desert, surrounded by spiders and scorpions. What could 
possibly be worse?
